title: Evening balance - following day
text: If the sales clerks have not done the evening balance the evening before, the POS will ask if this should be done when they open the POS the next morning. If the clerk says no and conducts a sale, it cannot be done later. The evening balance will then have to be done like always in the evening, and both days will be added to the turnover.
description:
If the sales clerks have not done the evening balance the evening before, the POS will ask if this should be done when they open the POS the next morning. 

  

If the clerk says no and conducts a sale, it cannot be done later. The evening balance will then have to be done like always in the evening, and both days will be added to the turnover.

title: Evening balance - receipt
text: If the receipt for the evening balance (the one with the overview from the card terminal etc.) is missing, then search for receipt, find the last receipt number, then look for a receipt with the number immediately after that and print it. 1. On the POS, click Shortcuts, then Search Note 2. Choose Date interval, then Start Date and End Date. Observe the number of the last receipt. 3. Choose Enter receipt number 4. Enter the number that is next in line and click search 5. Click Reprint to print the receipt again.
description:
If the receipt for the evening balance (the one with the overview from the card terminal etc.) is missing, then search for receipt, find the last receipt number, then look for a receipt with the number immediately after that and print it. 

  

1. On the POS, click Shortcuts, then Search Note 

2. Choose

 Date interval, then Start Date and End Date. Observe the number of the last receipt.

 


3. Choose

 Enter receipt number

 

4. Enter the number that is next in line and click search

 

5. Click

 Reprint to print the receipt again.

title: Evening balance – shows no turnover for the previous day
text: This is possibly because some transactions are in quarantine Contact DDD support if you have this issue
description:
This is possibly because some transactions are in quarantine


Contact DDD support if you have this issue

title: How to do Cash Statement/Kasseopgørelse
text: There are 3 steps in total to perform a cash statement. The clerk needs to record how much money is currently in the kasse and how much he should deposit in the bank. The money taken out in cash from the kasse needs to be registered in kasse report. The steps are as follows. The clerk needs to login to POS. Select Genvej and then click on Kasseopgørelse. Step 1 The clerk needs to enter the amount that is currently available(aftenbeholdning) in the kasse.In the example it is assumed that there are 20 Dkk now and click Næste/Next. Step 2: The next step is with how much cash money needs to be taken out of the kasse and should be deposited in the bank. In this case,the amount needs to be taken out for bank deposit is 50 DKK and click Next. Step 3: The final step justifies if all information entered by Clerk is correct and after confirmation the approved button is pressed and the cash statement is activated on the Kasse.
description:
There are 3 steps in total to perform a cash statement.
The clerk needs to record how much money is currently in the kasse and how much he should deposit in the bank.
The money taken out in cash from the kasse needs to be registered in kasse report.

The steps are as follows.

The clerk needs to login to POS.
Select Genvej and then click on Kasseopgørelse.



Step 1
The clerk needs to enter the amount that is currently available(aftenbeholdning) in the kasse.In the example it is assumed that there are 20 Dkk now and click Næste/Next.



Step 2:

The next step is with how much cash money needs to be taken out of the kasse and should be deposited in the bank.
In this case,the amount needs to be taken out for bank deposit is 50 DKK and click Next.


Step 3:

The final step justifies if all information entered by Clerk is correct and after confirmation the approved button is pressed and the cash statement is activated on the Kasse.

title: Evening balance - is it possible in test mode?
text: You can enter all the numbers in test mode, but you cannot complete the evening balance in test mode.
description: You can enter all the numbers in test mode, but you cannot complete the evening balance in test mode.

title: POS is asking for Evening balance in the morning - even if it has been done the day before
text: In this case you simply have to close DdDPOS, press on No and afterwards open the cash drawer. The system then no longer asks for the cash statement.
description:
In this case you simply have to close DdDPOS, press on No and afterwards open the cash drawer.

The system then no longer asks for the cash statement.
